title: GENIUS Act Establishes Federal Framework for US Stablecoins
summary: The GENIUS Act creates the first federal regulatory framework for stablecoins in the US, complementing the SEC's Bitcoin ETF approval and FASB's crypto accounting rules. This regulatory trifecta is driving institutional adoption of tokenized dollars and legitimizing digital assets for corporate treasuries.

title: FASB Crypto Accounting Rules Drive Corporate Treasury Adoption
summary: The FASB issued landmark accounting standards on December 13, 2023, mandating fair value treatment for crypto assets, which took effect December 15, 2024. This regulatory clarity is triggering a wave of corporate treasury adoption heading into 2025.

title: Stablecoin Issuance Surge Since November 2024
summary: Stablecoin issuance has experienced notable growth since early November 2024, indicating increased market confidence and adoption. The trend suggests growing institutional interest in regulated digital dollar solutions.
